cz.ive.util
Class MultiMap<A,B>

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      java.util.HashMap<A,java.util.Set<B>>
          cz.ive.util.MultiMap<A,B>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<A,java.util.Set<B>>
public class MultiMap<A,B>
extends java.util.HashMap<A,java.util.Set<B>>

Simple extension of java.util.HashMap - special behavior for managing Sets of objects in value of HashMap.

See Also:
Serialized Form

add single value to set of values - create new set or put to current one.
